activityDuration.title: Activity Duration
activityDuration.description: Length of time to engage in the activity.

activityFrequency.title: Activity Frequency
activityFrequency.description: How often one should engage in the activity.

additionalVariable.title: Additional Variable
additionalVariable.description: Any additional component of the exercise prescription that may need to be articulated to the patient. This may include the order of exercises, the number of repetitions of movement, quantitative distance, progressions over time, etc.

exerciseType.title: Exercise Type
exerciseType.description: Type(s) of exercise or activity, such as strength training, flexibility training, aerobics, cardiac rehabilitation, etc.

intensity.title: Intensity
intensity.description: Quantitative measure gauging the degree of force involved in the exercise, for example, heartbeats per minute. May include the velocity of the movement.

repetitions.title: Repetitions
repetitions.description: Number of times one should repeat the activity.

restPeriods.title: Rest Periods
restPeriods.description: How often one should break from the activity.

workload.title: Workload
workload.description: Quantitative measure of the physiologic output of the exercise; also referred to as energy expenditure.
